title: Kástron Khóstion
description: A complex of structures dating to the Greek and Roman period, with ceramic evidence of prior occupation of the vicinity, on a spur of Palióvouno, overlooking a valley leading to the bay of Saránda on the Korinthian Gulf. The excavators associate this site with the attested classical city of Khorsiai on the basis of epigraphic evidence recovered at the site.

properties.description: Central point determined using Google Earth imagery after Fossey and Morin. Dates after Fossey and Morin.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Acropolis (Kástron Khostíon)

properties.description: Central point determined using Google Earth imagery after Fossey 1988 and 2019. Dates after Fossey 2019.
